titles.title: 400 My Heart Is Resting, O My God (nice easy fit)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 v4 c1 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My heart is resting
O my God
I will give thanks and sing
My heart is at the
Secret source
Of ev'ry precious thing

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh peace of God
That passeth thought
I daily hourly sing
My heart is at the secret source
Of ev'ry precious thing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now this frail vessel
Thou hast made
No hand but Thine
Shall fill
The waters of
The earth have failed
And I am thirsty still

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I thirst for springs
Of heavenly life
And here all day they rise
I seek the treasure
Of Thy love
And close at hand it lies

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And a new song
Is in my mouth
To long loved music set
Glory to Thee for
All the grace
I have not tasted yet

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I have a heritage of joy
That yet I must not see
The hand that bled
To make it mine
Is keeping it for me

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
There is a certainty of love
That sets my heart at rest
A calm assurance
For today
That to be poor is best

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
A prayer reposing
On His truth
Who hath made
All things mine
That draws my captive
Will to Him
And makes it one
With Thine
